85098.「我が名は 光導使ミーミ……\n 我らが主 聖光教主と 交わせし誓いのもと\n:
I am Meemi, one of the Light Guides....
Under the oath exchanged with my master,
the Light Lord, I am here to guide you.

85099.「深遠なる意思に導かれ 紡がれし光芒。 \n 幾千もの光芒集いて 束になれば\n:
A woven radiance, guided by a profound will. When thousands of these radiances gather and unite as one, they inevitably become a
divine light.

85100.「聖光よ その大いなる輝きをもって\n この混迷の世界に あまねく降り注ぐ\n:
O divine light, with your great radiance...
Shower your rays of hope upon this
turmoiled world!

85101.「さあ。\n 勇気の紋章を 高く かかげてください。: Come. Hold high the Crest of Courage.

85102.<pc>は 勇気の紋章を空高く かかげた。:
<pc> holds the Crest of Courage
high.

85103.「今 聖光を紡ぎし \n 闘戦士 <pc>の 勇気のチカラを捧げ\n 次なる道を:
And now, offering the power of courage that
has been woven by the divine light...
Reveal thy path forward!
